The SAVE Moms and Babies Act would restore commonsense safety  protections, including requiring an in-person doctor visit before  mifepristone is prescribed. This drug should never be administered  through the mail, where abusers and traffickers can exploit others.

Until these safety protections are restored, I want to speak…
